songs.preamble:
Pumped up kicks is a hard song to like as a high-schooler. But it's a bop. It's got that whistled bit. The video has so many people vibing. The frisbee air-bounce. There's a meme comparing it to 夜に駆ける (yoru ni kakeru). However, that's not the Japanese song that pumped up kicks is like. Telecaster b-boy is that song.
I learned the song as a DDR map that has some fun twists and a quirky video. Then I started to listen to it casually. And I thought I knew what it meant: some sort of romance ending or something about some enigmatic television anchor or something.
After a quick google search, I realized that I was horrendously wrong. So horrendously wrong that I despaired for a day, convincing myself that my interpretation was one of many. But now I'm much more certain that I know what the song is about. But there's a lot of details that are... hard. And there are many versions of the song that you can find, each of which is fun to listen to and some are interesting interpretations of the original.

As one becomes an adult dedede
They're also isolated in wide open space.
A life philosopher then spoke up,
The girl became a bird.
Paying only lip service Papapa
Tying on battered shoes.
The digital believer said a curse,
The boy became wind.

Swinging and swaying, Nirvana
Rest well inside hospice care.

Telecaster b-boy
The affection to me
The lie-hardened Je te aime
The annoying g-girl
Charmingly excited
Canibalistically dancing
A victim, another, killed of by that hand there,
What could it be drawing?
Telecaster b-boy
The affection to me
Can nobody return?

Wondering on appearance Dedede
Biased and prejudiced
Sadistic
Speaking with those poised barbs
The girl became a flower
Even covering eyes Papapa
The people's voices became harsher
Those words that stabbed the heart
The boy turned around.

Swinging and swaying, Delusions
It's the two of us in hospice care.

Telecaster b-boy
The affection to me
The noise frazzled Je te aime
The agitated g-girl
Can't catch a break
The tear melting on the cheek
Wanting to forget, closing down the throat.
The remaining scabs
Telecaster b-boy
The affection to me
Can you just hold me right now?

In this current world
It's impossible to breathe
When a farewell was announced
Could you forgive us?
The weak people.
Let's meet again.

name.english: Rock n' roll, the morning light falls on you
name.romaji: Korogaru iwa, kimi ni asa ga furu
name.japanese: 転がる岩、君に朝が降る

songs.preamble: The ending of Bocchi the rock hits hard. I mean, here's a spoiler-laced reaction video that resonates with me. But one thing that stuck with me is the song. After learning about the connection to Asian Kung-fu Generation, I became a fan -- the world world world album is great, 君の街まで slaps, and Re:re: has been stuck in my head since erased anyway.

japanese:
出来れば世界を僕は塗り変えたい
戦争をなくすような大逸れたことじゃない
だけどちょっと それもあるよな

俳優や映画スターには成れない
それどころか 君の前でさえも上手に笑えない
そんな僕に術はないよな

何を間違った それさえもわからないんだ
ローリング ローリング
初めから持ってないのに胸が痛んだ
僕らはきっとこの先も
心絡まって ローリング ローリング
凍てつく地面を転がるように走り出した

理由もないのに何だか悲しい
泣けやしないから 余計に救いがない
そんな夜を温めるように歌うんだ

岩は転がって 僕たちを何処かに連れて行くように ように
固い地面を分けて命が芽生えた
あの丘を越えたその先は
光輝いたように ように
君の孤独も全て暴き出す朝だ

赤い 赤い小さな車は君を乗せて
遠く向こうの角を曲がって
此処からは見えなくなった

何をなくした それさえもわからないんだ
ローリング ローリング
初めから持ってないのに胸が痛んだ
僕らはきっとこの先も
心絡まって ローリング ローリング
凍てつく世界を転がるように走り出した

english:
If I could I'd repaint the world
Not something as big as world peace
But maybe there's a bit of that too

I can't be an actor or a movie star
Somebody like me? I can't smile properly in front of you
What can a guy like me do?

I don't even know the mistake that I made
rolling rolling
something I didn't have from the start still hurts my heart
surely from now on we'll still
be entangled rolling rolling
running like we're slipping on an icy floor

I don't have a reason, I'm just somewhat sad
I won't cry so I'm more helpless
I'm singing to warm up those nights.

The boulder rolls as if it's taking us some place some place
cutting the hard ground it sprouts life
crossing that hill and beyond that
in the light shining shining
the morning will expose your lonliness

A small small red car, with you in it
turns a distant corner
becomes invisible from here

I don't even know what I have lost
rolling rolling
something I didn't have from the start still hurts my heart
surely from now on we'll still
be entangled rolling rolling
running like we're slipping on an icy world

songs.preamble: I wasn't the biggest fan of this song until I understood the lyrics. But the movie it's from is great. And the scene it is from is one of the best. (Which I can't find on YouTube T_T so here's a PV.) Reincarnation love songs FTW. Also the lyrics here are for the original, not the movie version.

japanese:
やっと眼を覚ましたかい
それなのになぜ眼も合わせやしないんだい？
「遅いよ」と怒る君
これでもやれるだけ飛ばしてきたんだよ
心が身体を追い越してきたんだよ

君の髪や瞳だけで胸が痛いよ
同じ時を吸いこんで離したくないよ
遥か昔から知る その声に
生まれてはじめて 何を言えばいい？

君の前前前世から僕は 君を探しはじめたよ
そのぶきっちょな笑い方をめがけて やってきたんだよ
君が全然全部なくなって チリヂリになったって
もう迷わない また１から探しはじめるさ
むしろ０から また宇宙をはじめてみようか

どっから話すかな 君が眠っていた間のストーリー
何億 何光年分の物語を語りにきたんだよ
けどいざその姿この眼に映すと

君も知らぬ君とジャレて 戯れたいよ
君の消えぬ痛みまで愛してみたいよ
銀河何個分かの 果てに出逢えた
その手を壊さず どう握ったならいい？

君の前前前世から僕は 君を探しはじめたよ
その騒がしい声と涙をめがけ やってきたんだよ
そんな革命前夜の僕らを誰が止めるというんだろう
もう迷わない 君のハートに旗を立てるよ
君は僕から諦め方を 奪い取ったの

私たち超えれるかな この先の未来 数えきれぬ困難を
言ったろう 二人なら 笑って返り討ちにきっとできるさ
君以外の武器は 他にはいらないんだ

前前前世から僕は 君を探しはじめたよ
そのぶきっちょな笑い方をめがけて やってきたんだよ
君が全然全部なくなって チリヂリになったって
もう迷わない また１から探しはじめるさ
何光年でも この歌を口ずさみながら

english:
At last have you opened your eyes?
Well then why won't you even look me in the eye?
"You're late," you shouted at me,
well I hurried as much as I could,
my heart left my body to come over here.

Your hair or your irises tighten my chest.
Breathing together, I don't want to leave.
This voice I've known forever,
meeting you for the first time, what should I even say?

From you last-last-last life I've been looking for you.
That innocent laugh led me here.
Even if every piece of you disappeared, or was scattered everywhere,
I won't waver, I'll start over,
even restart the universe.

Where to start? The story while you were dreaming.
What billion years, what trillion years. That is the story I've come to tell.
But now seeing to reflected in my eyes.

I want to play and know a you you don't know.
I want to love you even the pain you feel.
This hand I've met across galaxies,
how to hold it without breaking it?

From you last-last-last life I've been looking for you.
That loud voice and your tears led me here.
On this eve of our revelution, who can even stop us now?
I won't waver, I'll claim your heart,
because you stole my way to give up.

Will we pass the invisible barriers ahead?
I think us two, will make it through laughing at the end.
I don't need another weapon except for you.

From you last-last-last life I've been looking for you.
That innocent laugh led me here.
Even if every piece of you disappeared, or was scattered everywhere,
I won't waver, I'll start over,
taking million years, singing this song.
